label: Structure
Function

options.B: Transmits pain signals to the brain

Q3.desc: Taxonomy: Definition of Pain Terms and Chronic Pain Syndromes
Q3.question: Match the pain term with its correct definition.
label: Pain Term
Definition

options.A: Pain persisting longer than three months
options.B: Pain that occurs due to nerve damage
options.C: Pain lasting less than three months
options.D: Pain from tissue damage or inflammation
